content.text:
*Assalamu Alaikum {{first_name}},*

Your registration with Muslim Students League (MSL) Pakistan has been successfully received.

*Membership ID:* {{membership_id}}

Our team will review your information shortly. Once your membership is approved, you will be informed automatically and guided to download your official Membership Card from the MSL Pakistan website.

Thank you for your interest in becoming part of MSL Pakistan.

Develop by WEBNIX

otp_verification.name: OTP Verification
otp_verification.description: Automatic template for card download verification

content.text: OTP Code: {{otp_code}}. This is your OTP for Membership Card. The OTP is valid for 10 minutes. Call 123-456-7890 if you did not perform this request.

approved.name: Membership Approved
approved.description: Automatic template when membership is approved

content.text:
*Assalamu Alaikum {{first_name}},*

We are pleased to inform you that your membership with Muslim Students League (MSL) Pakistan has been approved successfully.

Your official digital membership card has been generated and is now available for download.

Please click the button below and log in using your registered details to download your membership card.

This card serves as your official identification within MSL Pakistan.

Membership ID: {{membership_id}}

Best Regards
*MSL IT DEPARTMENT*

Develop by Abdul Manan
